Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now I understand why. Because I am the Sentinel's Resonator. I may not have any extraordinary abilities, but I do possess the Temporal Program that it accidentally lost.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If Jinzhou ever faces a similar time crisis, I... I might be the only one who can set things right.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...In our Sentinel's prediction, the battle between us is supposed to happen in the distant future.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It had been waiting for an opportunity, a right moment to tell me the truth. That's why it didn't explain.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now may not be the opportunity the Sentinel has been waiting for, but my body cannot hold up much longer...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have to go and face it while I still can… to learn about the truth, or complete our destined battle.

Options.PlotLineKey: You can still give up.
As your friend, I don't want to see you suffer.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Give up... my duty? I never thought about it...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To be honest... I did doubt myself many times.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It was the endless kindness of you, Changli, Xinyi, and everyone in Jinzhou that gave me the courage to push on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even Jué's decision to bring me back to life... Whether out of pity or not, I am truly grateful. The thought of it warms my heart every time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinzhou holds everything that's dear to me. Even without the title of Magistrate, I could never leave Jinzhou behind.

Options.PlotLineKey: But you're in pain...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm okay...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The pain I'm feeling is nothing compared to those trapped in the Temporal Disruptions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I must find the Sentinel as soon as possible. We draw from the same source of power—saving it means saving myself.

Options.PlotLineKey: Do you have to fight the Sentinel?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If there is truly no other option in the end...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then I will have to fight it. I refuse to back down.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will fight. To protect the Sentinel, and to defend Jinzhou. One life may be lost, but many will be saved.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If it means keeping everyone safe, then I have no regrets giving my own life.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But let me make one thing clear—I am not planning on dying yet. I am here to fight for a chance at survival, no matter how slim that chance may be.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're not in a situation where death is our only option, are we?

Options.PlotLineKey: I trust your decision.
I will help you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for placing your trust in me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come to think of it, many good things have happened to me since you arrived in Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, {PlayerName}.

Options.PlotLineKey: I am always here for you.
I'll make sure you turn out safe.
I'll go meet the Sentinel with you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My teacher Changli told me it's up to both of us to solve the crisis at Mt. Firmament. As I know you have a special connection with our Sentinel, I need your support in this decision.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But don't worry, I'm prepared. This isn't about succumbing to destiny, it's about embracing it fully.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I am grateful to have you by my side through it all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You learn about Jinhsi's past. Jinhsi is adamant about fulfilling her duty. The prophesied battle between her and the Sentinel was meant for the distant future, but she is willing to confront the Sentinel now if it is the only way to keep everyone safe. She expresses her gratitude for your companionship.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinhsi, it has been quite some time.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And greetings, {Male=Lord;Female=Lady} Arbiter. Or should one address you as "Rover" now?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One cannot discern the cause of your arrival, yet its significance heralds Jinzhou's fateful juncture.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shall a "child" who has lost their memories take up arms and fight for their fate? Or shall they retreat to their cradle and slumber?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The seed of the future shall be sown in this very moment.

Options.PlotLineKey: What do you mean by "Arbiter"? What should I do?
I don't understand. Care to explain again?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once the situation settles, an explanation shall be provided. For now, one must implore you to simply engage, decide, and observe.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinhsi, your journey has been an arduous one. Aside from aiding one in this predicament, surely there are other inquiries you wish to make?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I cannot bring myself to ask for more. All I seek is the truth.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mt. Firmament is in grave danger... Regarding the Temporal Mandate and your injuries... Please, do not keep the truth from me any longer.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One understands your concerns. The timing may not be optimal for this disclosure, yet in the midst of crisis, one must act with expedience.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For one will soon perish.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One such as this, of immortal nature, is designed to endure for all time.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yet one suffered severe harm in ancient times, and now relies on the Mianloong Chamber for survival.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is not the optimal solution.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For a long time, one has had to use this chamber to replenish energy, hoping to delay the inevitable doom.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yet fate cannot be defied. The Fractsidus have conspired against this one. Now, the injury only worsens... The Mianloong Chamber can no longer prolong one's life.

Options.PlotLineKey: If you die, what will happen to Jinzhou?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinzhou... The city of Jinzhou will be no more.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ever since one descended upon Mt. Firmament, using the power of Temporal Mandate to repel Tacet Discords, time has been in disarray within this location. The fate of Jinzhou was sealed from that moment on.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Over the past millenia, one has defied the laws of nature and sustained Jinzhou at the cost of one's own life force.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Otherwise, the Temporal Disruption would wreak havoc not only on Mt. Firmament, but on the entire region of Jinzhou. If this were to happen, all life will be engulfed in a chaotic storm of twisted time flow.

Options.PlotLineKey: What would happen to them?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinzhou shall forever remain frozen in time. The past and the future meld into one, rendering life indistinguishable from death. The ceremonial rituals and endless battles persist, intertwining joy and sorrow into an eternal blur.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All inhabitants of Jinzhou shall endure this perpetual fate until time itself ceases to exist.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...It is this one's own doing, and one must put an end to it.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the coming days, one will exert every ounce of strength to freeze the time in Jinzhou at the cost of one's remaining life.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In that moment, Jinzhou will fall into stillness, but not perish. In the distant future, the people of Huanglong may discover a method to rescue Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is there truly nothing else we can do?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is not the optimal solution, but it suffices as an option.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please forgive me... but I cannot do as you say.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A decade, a century... What if nobody comes up with a solution? By that time, the world will have turned its back on this forgotten city...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...And who would be willing to spend precious resources rescuing a small city in a far-off corner of the world?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinzhou's fate deserves better than an uncertain future.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whilst one may not live to witness the future, one can still envision endless possibilities yet to come. In my deduction, this method proves to be the most effective and stable.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Magistrate Jinhsi, as you express doubts, pray tell how do you propose to solve this issue?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The flow of time upon Mt. Firmament is in disarray, and it can only be contained through one's utmost effort.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If one does not freeze the time now, the situation in Jinzhou shall surely worsen a hundredfold, or even a thousandfold, after one's passing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ..You once predicted a destined battle between us... Is it true?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Correct.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I was lost at first, struggling to grasp the prophecy's meaning. Only when I learned of your actions alongside the Court of Savantae did it all become clear—

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By clashing two resonating powers, a Second Resonance Awakening can be induced. Through this, I am able to push my Resonance Ability beyond its limits and invoke the Temporal Mandate to restore the flow of time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Though I will be forced to raise my blade against you...

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: RIDICULOUS!

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you clash with my Resonance power, even the smallest mistake will result in Overclocking and leave you nothing but an empty husk.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You are well aware of its excruciating effects. The pain you feel now is but a faint scratch in comparison to its true torment.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Moreover, you will be trapped within the fissures of time itself. Your being will be relentlessly shredded and mended, day after day, denied any respite for eternity.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I can restore the errors in the flow of time. Isn't that why you saved me all those years ago? I'm just doing what you've been doing all along... Going against fate to keep Jinzhou safe.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinhsi, you are given one last opportunity. Let me freeze the time, and I can ensure your safety.

Options.PlotLineKey: There must be another way.
What if I help her? I am here for a reason.
Is there really no chance for her to live?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You are only here to witness before the right time arrives.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But you are not compelled to remain idle. Should you intervene, we may augment Jinhsi's odds of survival by a fraction.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Command me to transfer my Temporal Mandate access to Jinhsi at the right moment.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: —The moment of her Resonance Ability's depletion, when she is teetering on the brink of Overclocking and near death. Then, we may still save her life.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Miss that moment by even the slightest margin, and Jinhsi's fate will be sealed.

Options.PlotLineKey: I will do everything I can to keep Jinhsi safe.
So a fight between you two is unavoidable.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You meet Jué in the depths of the Mianloong Chamber. Jué calls you "Arbiter" and invites you to step in as Jinzhou makes a historical turn and witness the transformations to come. Knowing that it is dying, Jué is willing to use its remaining life force to freeze Jinzhou in time, so that future generations may have a chance to save it. Jinhsi refuses to accept this and decides to fight the Sentinel, even at the cost of her own life.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I should have died a long time ago... but I was lucky enough to be saved by you, allowing me the chance to see the glittering lights of Jinzhou for myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...You rewinded time to save me. I am responsible.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinzhou is my home. If it's ever in danger, I will do everything in my power to protect what I hold dear, even at the cost of my own life.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Such a valiant speech!

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you know the weight of this decision?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I understand your concerns. I will reach my Second Awakening with our destined confrontation, and restore the time flow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you willing to bet on me?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Restore the time flow? Pray, from where does this confidence arise?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You are my Resonator, but your strength is only a fraction of mine.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There is little chance for you to retreat unscathed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I can at least win some hope for our people!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even if it costs me my soul, my everything... I cannot die without trying.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I may only bear your power for a fleeting moment... It's all I need to secure a better future for Jinzhou, defying all of your predictions. And I can keep you safe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If there is anyone who can face you in a fight...That person has to be your Resonator.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will be your final winning move in this game.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: HAHAHAHAHA!

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you truly ready to challenge a being worshipped by your kind? Will you not regret it when you meet your bitter demise?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will not regret it, no matter what.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Very well! Magistrate of Jinzhou!

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come to the summit. Demonstrate your prowess!

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Show me how you shall be my triumphant ace.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {Male=Lord;Female=Lady} Arbiter, one is curious about your choice this time.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wherever the tides may take us, you will bear witness to our fight.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Government must be guided by virtue. Hsi, do you keep this in mind?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, virtue must come first. Politics, commerce—it all must serve the people.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: From now on, you shall be known as "Jinhsi," bearing Jinzhou's name as your own.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What do you think of this world?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Like... here. Darkness clings, but lights flicker in the gloom...

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A guiding light is not easily lit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's why they stand out so brightly against the darkness.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This entrance leads to one's Sonoro Sphere. Magistrate Jinhsi, one shall await you there.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, this battle is related to the fate of Jinzhou, and only you can open this Sonoro Sphere. The key to Jinzhou's future lies in your hands.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...If I open it, Jinhsi is bound to face you in the ultimate battle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The ideal outcome would be for her to absorb your power at the critical moment and restore the time flow without any loss of life.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But there's also a chance that she could push herself too far and end up dying from Overclocking.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though... if I do nothing, you'll use your remaining power to freeze all of Jinzhou in time.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Correct.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, please let us know your choice.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}...

Options.PlotLineKey: I will open the entrance once you're ready.
There will be no turning back...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have been preparing for this moment.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I understand. I have made up my mind since before I stepped foot on Mt. Firmament.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Leaving Jinzhou behind fills me with regret, knowing I may never again bask in its glorious sunshine or witness the purity of its snowflakes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But that's why I'm here—to ensure that others can still experience the wonders of nature.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our city has a rich history, with generations witnessing endless sunrises and sunsets at the border. Our people have sacrificed their blood and tears to protect Huanglong's safety.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They deserve a bright future.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I want to protect Jinzhou in my own way, as Jinhsi, as a citizen of Jinzhou, and as Jinzhou's Magistrate.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, let's begin.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: On the summit of Mt. Firmament, Jué waits in the Sonoro Sphere for a challenger. Jinzhou's fate is in Jinhsi's hands, and she will fight for it in her own way. You support her decision and open the door to the Sonoro Sphere, ready to witness this key moment in Jinzhou's history.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Quite the impressive feat, Magistrate Jinhsi.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However, you are still a long way from inheriting my power.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Back down now while you still can.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have made up my mind, and I will not back down.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You once said it's not easy to become a candle of light...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I still want to try. I want to see if I can ignite a spark of hope for Jinzhou!

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinhsi has recovered. One will soon send her back to Jinzhou for recuperation. Please do not worry.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With all matters resolved, as per the agreement, it is time for one to address you.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One is prepared to answer any inquiries you may have.

Options.PlotLineKey: (Ask about your past.)
(Ask about the "choice" and the "access".)
(Ask about Jinhsi's condition.)
(Ask about the current situation in Hongzhen.)
I have no other questions.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I am Jué the Sentinel, the guide of Jinzhou's civilization. Everything about Jinzhou has been stored in my mind.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You, {PlayerName}, are my Arbiter, and my former master.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In bygone days, I stood by your side as you established  Jinzhou City. You tasked me with safeguarding its prosperity.

Options.PlotLineKey: So why did I lose my memories?
Who am I?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This one begs your pardon, for it is not all-knowing. All my knowledge came from you.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the past, one was granted the key to that Sonoro Sphere by your hand.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You said you planned to participate in history, to make choices and witness the development of civilizations.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One had previously requested for permission to transfer the Temporal Mandate to Jinhsi, as that is how one is designed to function.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Every ounce of my existence, from life to death and even the passing on of power, is subject to your approval.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since Jinhsi has inherited my power, the Temporal Programs are now complete. Jinzhou is no longer under threat.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinhsi has fully assumed the mantle of leadership. From this day forth, one shall only offer aid when it is truly needed.

Options.PlotLineKey: Why didn't you tell Jinhsi about it earlier?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This situation has been analyzed before, but the number of variables made reaching a safe conclusion impossible.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To accomplish her goal, Jinhsi must possess both strength and confidence. Revealing the truth to her earlier would only add to her troubles and not aid in improving her abilities.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Today was not the ideal moment for our destined battle to unfold, but the Fractsidus has remarkably escalated its arrival.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The flow of time on Mt. Firmament has been restored to its natural pace, but the citizens of Hongzhen must still contend with shortened lifespans should they attempt to depart.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fortunately, with Jinhsi's Resonance Ability, they can stay safe as long as they remain on the mountain.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For lack of a better solution, this is the best we can do.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Through countless ages, the imposing Mt. Firmament stood firm against the storms. But as spring brings thunder and change, one feels a spark of transformation in the air.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The people of Hongzhen have a bright future ahead, one that can be steered in the right direction within mere days. With proper leadership.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your Tacet Mark... There is something unusual.

Options.PlotLineKey: You mean Abby?
Abby, wake up. Someone's asking about you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa... What... What's wrong?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, who's bullying you?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is it you, big thing?! Huh?! How dare you, I'm gonna teach you a le...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm? Wait, pause... I don't think it has any bad intentions... It smells like the "unnatural" smell I smelled in Jinzhou before...

Options.PlotLineKey: Well, about the Sentinel I was looking for...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ooh, so you must be that Sentinel! Hehe, hello there big one!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, why didn't you wake me up earlier? I've got a feeling I missed out on a lot of fun!

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...It does feel similar to me, but there is some difference.

Options.PlotLineKey: Do you know what it is?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...This entity is unfamiliar to me. As it resides within your Tacet Mark, one can only assume you granted it access intentionally.

Options.PlotLineKey: Then who else can answer my questions?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {Male=Lord;Female=Lady} Arbiter, have you heard of the Black Shores?

Options.PlotLineKey: The Black Shores? I've heard of them.
Yeah, I know those people.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Black Shores is the starting point of your journey in this world. If you have doubts, this one suggests a visit to that island.

Options.PlotLineKey: I'll keep it in mind.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Worry not.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The wuthering waves ebb and flow. They shall send you back to where you belong.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As the dust settles, Jué meets with you as promised. You learn that you were once Jué's master and established Jinzhou with its assistance. Jué notices something usual about your Tacet Mark just as Abby appears and the two confront each other. Even Jué is uncertain of Abby's origins, but suggests that you visit the Black Shores, the starting point of your journey in this world.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One suggests heading back to Hongzhen to reunite with your companions, {Male=Lord;Female=Lady} Arbiter.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Jué"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With Mt. Firmament no longer posing a threat, surely Hongzhen will undergo significant changes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Storyteller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mt. Firmament glowed with the sun's light, high above the clouds and snow. Then suddenly, they vanished, revealing a distant blue sky.

Dialogues.Speaker: Storyteller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And amidst it all stood a white-haired maiden, like a goddess descended from the heavens.

Dialogues.Speaker: Storyteller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With a mere wave of her hand, she brought forth a new season, transforming the streets below.

Dialogues.Speaker: Storyteller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This maiden was none other than the dead infant, now reborn as the Magistrate of Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Storyteller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "When thunder roars in spring's embrace, the sun shall shine upon this place."

Dialogues.Speaker: Storyteller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "For only through death and strife, can one truly embrace new life."

Dialogues.Speaker: Phrolova
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... I see. Doesn't matter. That’s not important for our goal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phrolova
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: —With the Second Resonance Awakening, we will tap into powers that rival the Sentinels... Complete control of the artificial Resonator Awakening process is within reach.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phrolova
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And lastly, about that Rover...

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This trip was worth it. We've collected many wonderful notes, haven't we?

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's about time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phrolova
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Get moving. Can't let a certain someone wait too long behind bars.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The flow of time has returned to normal. Mt. Firmament thrives once more, and you journey to Hongzhen to meet with Changli and Xinyi. All is not what it seems, however. The Fractsidus is planning its next move...

Dialogues.Speaker: Storyteller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mt. Firmament glowed with the sun's light, high above the clouds and snow. Then suddenly, they vanished, revealing a distant blue sky.

Dialogues.Speaker: Storyteller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And amidst it all stood a white-haired maiden, like a goddess descended from the heavens.

Dialogues.Speaker: Storyteller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With a mere wave of her hand, she brought forth a new season, transforming the streets below.

Dialogues.Speaker: Storyteller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This maiden was none other than the dead infant, now reborn as the Magistrate of Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Storyteller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "When thunder roars in spring's embrace, the sun shall shine upon this place."

Dialogues.Speaker: Storyteller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "For only through death and strife, can one truly embrace new life."
